title: How do I save my data traffic?
answer:
l   Try to use Wi-Fi networks more often.

l   Turn off your data service when you don't need to go on the Internet.

To quickly turn on or off your data service, open the notification panel and touch ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20150707131535408001.png).

l   When you surf the Internet, set your phone to block images on web pages.

On the browser screen, touch ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20150707131535227002.png) > **Settings** > **Bandwidth management**, and clear the **Load images** check box.

![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20150707131536255003.jpg)![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20150707131536451004.jpg)![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20150707131536836005.jpg) 

l   Prevent applications from accessing the Internet using your mobile data connection.

Go to the **Settings** screen, touch **Networked apps** > **System applications**, and follow the onscreen instructions to prevent applications from accessing the Internet using your mobile data connection.

![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20150707131536771006.jpg)![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20150707131536758007.jpg)

![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20150707131536182008.jpg)![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20150707131537867009.jpg)

l   If not needed, turn off background data synchronization.

Open the notification panel, and touch ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20150707131537737010.png).

![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20150707131537646011.jpg)

l   Close networked applications not in use.

Touch ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20150707131537804012.png) to display the list of recently used applications. Flick up across an application to close it, or flick up from the bottom of the screen to close all applications simultaneously.

![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20150707131537198013.png)

The figures are for your reference only. The actual screens may vary.
